Avengers : Endgame

8.4
181m
2019
PG-13

Action, Adventure, Drama

After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

    Starring

    Elizabeth Olsen Wanda Maximoff Tom Holland Spider-Man Chadwick Boseman Black Panther Josh Brolin Thanos Joe Russo Chris Pratt Star-Lord Sebastian Stan Bucky Barnes Jon Favreau Harold "Happy" Hogan Hayley Atwell Peggy Carter Gwyneth Paltrow Pepper Potts Zoe Saldana Gamora Evangeline Lilly Anthony Mackie Sam Wilson Tom Hiddleston Loki Benedict Cumberbatch Doctor Strange Rene Russo Frigga Benedict Wong Wong Tessa

    Directed By

    Anthony Russo, Joe Russo
